Gwadar (Balochi/Urdu: گوادر) bụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nwere isi obodo South Balochistan,  dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ ụsọ oké osimiri Balochistan, Pakistan
Obodo a dị n’ikpere mmiri nke Oke Osimiri Arab chere ihu Oman
Gwadar bụ obodo 100th kasị ukwuu na Pakistan, dịka ngụkọ 2017 siri dị

Ọ bụ ihe onwunwe mba ofesi nke Oman site na 1783 ruo 1958.  Ọ dị ihe dịka 120 km (75 mi) ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Turbat, ebe nwanne nwanyị ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Chabahar na Iran Sistan na Baluchestan Province dị ihe dịka 170 km (110 mi) n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Gwadar.
